EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-01-23-Field-East-RD-Sponsored-Montreal.ES-2017-12-20-Montreal-05.EMAIL
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Us January 23rd Canadiens v. Avalanche
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Bonjour {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are pleased to invite you to a small event we are hosting with Cisco on January 23rd in your area. This will be a great opportunity to meet with your fellow technology leaders, share challenges, and discuss trends heading into the new year. Hope you can make it.
Montreal IT Networking Event: Hosted by Cisco & Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-montreal/]]> Montreal Canadiens vs Colorado Avalanche Tuesday, January 23rd 6:30pm
We would love to have you join the conversation. Please let us know if you can make it and RSVP on our registration page here <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-montreal/]]>.
Merci, Your Turbonomic Team <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-montreal/]]>
